parts.title: Part 1 – Introduction & Interview
questions: What do you enjoy most about your work/studies?
Do you prefer mornings or evenings?
How often do you use technology in your daily life?
What do you like to do in your free time?
What type of music do you like?

parts.title: Part 2 – Cue Card
parts.prompt: Describe a place you would like to visit in the future.
guide: Why you want to visit it
And explain why it is special to you

parts.title: Part 3 – Discussion
questions: How has travel changed compared to the past?
What are the advantages of visiting other countries?
Do you think people will travel more in the future?
What impact does tourism have on local communities?
How important is it to learn about different cultures?

instructions: You will have approximately 11-14 minutes for the entire speaking test. Make sure to speak clearly and naturally.
